title: Full-Stack E-Commerce Application
description: I developed a full-stack e-commerce application using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, featuring an admin panel that allows seamless product management including addition and deletion of items. The platform offers users a smooth experience for browsing, buying, and selling products. I ensured the application was responsive and secure, and collaborated with the team to optimize its performance.

title: SpaceX Frontend Clone
description: I utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a responsive front-end for the SpaceX website. This involved designing and implementing user-friendly interfaces that adapt seamlessly to various devices and screen sizes, ensuring an optimal browsing experience for all users.
